title: Both sub-ambient and above-ambient conditions: a comprehensive approach for the efficient use of radiative cooling
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, 17,4498-4507
DOI: 10.1039/D3EE04261H, Paper
Huajie Tang, Chenyue Guo, Fan Fan, Haodan Pan, Qihao Xu, Dongliang Zhao
A new concept of self-adaptive radiative cooling with infrared spectral selective regulation is proposed, enabling high-efficiency radiative cooling under both sub- and above-ambient conditions.
